creator: Lodgify
descriptionHtml:
Oversee all your bookings, update your calendar and connect with your guests. Our intuitive app will help you run your short-term rental business from anywhere, whether you manage one property or 100!
How can the Lodgify app help you manage your vacation rental business? For starters, you will get a push notification every time you get a new booking. Therefore, you can easily keep track of any changes in your calendar.
You can also access your calendar to check your availability for all your properties, create new closed periods and bookings for your vacation rental, review any guest details and quotes, and even contact your upcoming guests by sending automated messages!
Basically, you won’t have to be at your desk anymore to properly run your vacation rental business! Do you want to give it a try? Download it now for free!
These are all the features from Lodgify’s vacation rental app:
Reservation / Booking System:
• Receive push notifications for new bookings
• Create new bookings and edit existing ones
• View and edit guest details
• View and manage quotes
• Add notes
Calendar:
• Create and manage bookings directly from your calendar
• Create closed periods
• Check live availability and rates for your properties
• Filter calendar view and bookings by property, dates and source
Channel Manager:
• Integrate all your listings into one centralized platform / multicalendar
• You will be notified whenever you receive a booking, whether it’s coming directly from your own website or any external listing platform, such as Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia or Booking.com
• When you receive a new reservation in one channel, the dates will automatically be blocked from all the other calendars - say goodbye to double-bookings!
Guest communication:
• Send canned responses and messages to guests
descriptionShort: Easily manage your vacation rental from your smartphone with the Lodgify's app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Not able to select a language when creating a reservation.
Not able save promotion\taxes\fees in reservation in case if decimal amount was entered.
Adding email to reserevation back button not functioning.
Edit nightly override price error.
There is a grey background instead of quote of the reservation.
The inputted value is reset to 0 in all distances fields after saving.
Clicking the edit guest back button should go to reservation details.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Contact support through the quick help button, in the user menu
-Edit your nightly rate through the default rates section of your rentals
-Searchable drop downs designed to filter your options and get you creating bookings faster
-Added the same filters you are already familiar with on the web app
-Accept booking request from Airbnb
-Landscape view in calendar no longer move the check out dates 1 day in the past
-Order of the rentals in calendar will be saved
-Guest phone number bug fixed

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
Directly copy, call and add guests’ phone numbers from the booking overview in Calendar (coming next month)
Access booking.com link when tapping on Calendar reservations coming from that channel
Symbols like “!” now supported
What’s fixed
Checkout day now considered in iCal date blocks on Calendar
Screen no longer freezes after clicking on “Create quote” from the booking details

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
Use new tabs to switch between Multi and Single views in Calendar
Options to show/hide rental’s name, internal name and image in Calendar
Star countries to pin them in the Country drop-down
improvements toward web parity and better performance in reservation module

What’s fixed
Text SMS option from VRBO booking contacts now working
Creating quotes from booking inquiries is operative
Booking requests correctly set to Tentative status after acceptance and to ----Booked after payment

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
Rental minimum stay visible in Calendar single view
Hold down on guest contact info to copy it
Set Calendar sorting preferences from bottom sheet
Faster navigation with Calendar pickers
Automatic capitalization
Optional VAT for promotions, fees, and taxes
Pencil icon to edit guest info and notes on Calendar
What’s fixed
Added source link to bookings’ details
Bottom sheet menu closes properly in Calendar view
All iCal blocks now displayed in Calendar

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
View damage deposit card for reservations if set up.
Edit reservations when guests request changes.

What’s fixed
iCal blocks display correct reservation dates.
Fixed error with contact button for booking.com reservations on WhatsApp.
Resolved issue with deleting nightly overrides.
Notes can now be added to reservations from the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
- Enhanced control over damage deposits: Pre-authorize, void authorizations, capture charges, and mark as paid from the Damage protection section.
- Simplified login process: Save your password with one click and forget about typing it every time you log in.
- Improved photo capabilities: iOS users can attach photos from the camera roll or take new ones for inbox messages.
- Refunds made easy: Issue refunds to payments just like you do on the web.

How can the Lodgify app help you manage your vacation rental business? For starters, you will get a push notification every time you get a new booking. Therefore, you can easily keep track of any changes in your calendar.
You can also access your calendar to check your availability for all your properties, create new closed periods and bookings for your vacation rental, review any guest details and quotes, and even contact your upcoming guests by sending automated messages!
Basically, you won’t have to be at your desk anymore to properly run your vacation rental business! Do you want to give it a try? Download it now for free!
These are all the features from Lodgify’s vacation rental app:
Reservation / Booking System:
• Receive push notifications for new bookings
• Create new bookings and edit existing ones
• View and edit guest details
• View and manage quotes
• Add notes
Calendar:
• Create and manage bookings directly from your calendar
• Create closed periods
• Check live availability and rates for your properties
• Filter calendar view and bookings by property, dates and source
Channel Manager:
• Integrate all your listings into one centralized platform / multicalendar
• You will be notified whenever you receive a booking, whether it’s coming directly from your own website or any external listing platform, such as Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia or Booking.com
• When you receive a new reservation in one channel, the dates will automatically be blocked from all the other calendars - say goodbye to double-bookings!
Guest communication:
• Send canned responses and messages to guests

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s fixed
- We've squashed the pesky bug that caused bookings to be cut out when continuing to a second line. Now, your bookings will appear correctly for their entire duration.
- Say goodbye to "Ical" mishaps! We've restored the correct names to all iCal bookings, ensuring they display as assigned.
- Need a date detective? Look no further! We've made the current date in your single-view calendar stand out with a bold blue color. Now, it's easier than ever to spot today's date.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s new
Bid adieu to the days of hunting down the origin or status of a booking. With our brand-new mobile app calendar, it’s a piece of cake:
Effortlessly identify the source of your bookings.
Observe the borders to discover booking statuses: A solid border indicates confirmation, while a dashed line signifies a tentative booking.
Stay informed without breaking a sweat!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're leveling up your experience with these exciting updates:
- You'll discover a summary of the credit card used for payment in your reservations: last 4 digits, cardholder's name, card type, and the expiration date. Just like in the browser app!
- Our mobile app has gained a superpower. It can now detect phone numbers in messages, offering options like texting, calling, adding to contacts, or copying.
- We've squashed bugs for a smoother ride.

- AI assistant: Seamlessly handle guest inquiries with natural language processing in the inbox and messaging section.

Booking agenda now mirrors web experience on mobile. Message via WhatsApp, text, or inbox if contact details provided.

Copy notes from reservation screen or calendar without opening editor.

Copy, call, and add contacts buttons now placed below phone numbers.
Add photos to your rentals by taking a pic on the spot or select from your gallery.

descriptionHtml:
Oversee all your bookings, update your calendar and connect with your guests. Our intuitive app will help you run your short-term rental business from anywhere, whether you manage one property or 100!
How can the Lodgify app help you manage your vacation rental business? For starters, you will get a push notification every time you get a new booking. Therefore, you can easily keep track of any changes in your calendar.
You can also access your calendar to check your availability for all your properties, create new closed periods and bookings for your vacation rental, review any guest details and quotes, and even contact your upcoming guests by sending automated messages!
Basically, you won’t have to be at your desk anymore to properly run your vacation rental business! Do you want to give it a try? Download it now for free!
These are all the features from Lodgify’s vacation rental app:
Reservation / Booking System:
• Receive push notifications for new bookings
• Create new bookings and edit existing ones
• View and edit guest details
• View and manage quotes
• Add notes
Calendar:
• Create and manage bookings directly from your calendar
• Create closed periods
• Check live availability and rates for your properties
• Filter calendar view and bookings by property, dates and source
Channel Manager:
• Integrate all your listings into one centralized platform / multicalendar
• You will be notified whenever you receive a booking, whether it’s coming directly from your own website or any external listing platform, such as Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia or Booking.com
• When you receive a new reservation in one channel, the dates will automatically be blocked from all the other calendars - say goodbye to double-bookings!
Guest communication:
• Send canned responses and messages to guests

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Milestone: More intuitive menu icons for a seamless navigation experience!
- Inbox: Enhanced chat experience. Replying to guests is easier, and faster.
- Tasks: Update the inspection status.
- Tasks: Create tasks on the go!

title:
Lodgify - Vacation Rental App
4.6.0

creator: Lodgify

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Milestone: Don’t miss the new inbox summary! Prioritize the conversations more efficiently!

- Rentals: Adjusted advanced notice settings.
- VRBO: Adjusted the quote creation possibility for booking inquiries.
- In-App reviews: share your thoughts!

Fixes:
- Call Us button no longer has issue with microphone.
- Quotes creation now take into account external rates in all cases.

title:
Lodgify - Vacation Rental App
4.7.0
